About Us

A Partner for your

Product Marketing

You can trust we are committed to helping you find the profound connection between your product and it’s audience, using Traditional Advertising & Digital Marketing engineered with the right Messaging.

Here is the altar from where your product and the market walk down the aisle to become one.

OOH Media Planning/Buying

Outdoor advertising has proven to be an effective channel to connect audience to product and establish a strong brand identity.

Digital Marketing

For more detail in messaging and fervency, digital marketing does the trick, also doubles as a winning combo with outdoor advertising.

Messaging

Nothing has ever been as important as telling the right story the “write way”, helps your sales team say less and sell more.

Brand Affilation

We have/had cooperate relationships with the below mentioned, at different times:

Audiomack - our first international client who have trusted us with all their OOH activities in Nigeria.

Paystack - we played an advisory role in their procurement of OOH sites in the last quarter of 2020.

Oleks Merchant Service - our first and longest existing client who have kept us in charge of a bulk of her marketing activities.

Landmark OHMS Ltd - former employer of our founder, who still partner with us under different capacities.

... and here is You - new client, enthusiastic to give us a try
